name: cmcmii

stmt.origin: mpbi(wbr(c0, ccm, c1), wbr(c1, ccm, c0))

body.origin:
|- wbr(c0, ccm, c1)
-| wbr(c1, ccm, c0)
-| wb(wbr(c1, ccm, c0), wbr(c0, ccm, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wbr(c0, ccm, c1)
-| wbr(c1, ccm, c0)
-| wb(wbr(c1, ccm, c0), wbr(c0, ccm, c1))

body.origin:
|- wb(wbr(c1, ccm, c0), wbr(c0, ccm, c1))
-| wcel(c1, cch)
-| wcel(c0, cch)

cumulated.origin:
|- wbr(c0, ccm, c1)
-| wbr(c1, ccm, c0)
-| wcel(c1, cch)
-| wcel(c0, cch)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0[C_H]c1
⊣ c1[C_H]c0
⊣ c1 ∈ CH
⊣ c0 ∈ CH

comment: Commutation is symmetric. Theorem 2(v) of [Kalmbach] p. 22. (Contributed by NM, 7-Aug-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
